document.discussion_title: Morning Rituals Of Tim Cook, Barack Obama, Highly Successful People - DesignTAXI.com
document.topic_text: Morning Rituals Of Tim Cook, Barack Obama, Highly Successful People By Louise Jane Cher , 06 Jan 2016 How do highly successful people start their day? This interactive website by Fleximize may give you some insight. It details the morning routines of people like Apple CEO Tim Cook, Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Wintour, and US President Barack Obama—from when they wake up, to having breakfast and getting ready before starting work.
